CustomField.description: This phone number is contactable if the the number is Not in DNC, has a Wash Date, and the Wash Date is at most 30 days from today
CustomField.formula: IF( Phone_on_DNC__c = FALSE && NOT ISBLANK(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c) && TODAY() - Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c < 31, TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This phone number is contactable if the the number is Not in DNC, has a Wash Date, and the Wash Date is at most 30 days from today
CustomField.label: Phone DNC Contactable
